00110     template <typename ROWCOL, typename MATRIXTYPE>
00111     class matrix_iterator
00112     {
00113         typedef matrix_iterator<ROWCOL, MATRIXTYPE>    self_type;
00114       public:
00115         typedef typename MATRIXTYPE::value_type       value_type;
00116         
00117         matrix_iterator(MATRIXTYPE & mat, unsigned int start_row, unsigned int start_col) : _mat(mat), _row(start_row), _col(start_col) {};
00118         
00119         value_type operator*(void) { return _mat(_row, _col); }
00120         self_type & operator++(void) { viennacl::tools::MATRIX_ITERATOR_INCREMENTER<ROWCOL, MATRIXTYPE>::apply(_mat, _row, _col); return *this; }
00121         self_type & operator++(int) { self_type tmp = *this; ++(*this); return tmp; }
00122         
00123         bool operator==(self_type const & other) { return (_row == other._row) && (_col == other._col); }
00124         bool operator!=(self_type const & other) { return !(*this == other); }
00125         
00126         unsigned int index1() { return _row; }
00127         unsigned int index2() { return _col; }
00128         
00129         MATRIXTYPE & operator()(void) const { return _mat; }
00130       
00131       private:
00132         MATRIXTYPE & _mat;
00133         unsigned int _row;
00134         unsigned int _col;
00135     };

00290     template<class SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00291     std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream & s, const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix)
00292     {
00293       std::vector<SCALARTYPE> tmp(gpu_matrix.internal_size());
00294       cl_int err;
00295       err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE) * gpu_matrix.internal_size(), &tmp[0], 0, NULL, NULL);
00296       CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00297       viennacl::ocl::finish();
00298       
00299       s << "[" << gpu_matrix.size1() << "," << gpu_matrix.size2() << "]";
00300       
00301       s << "(";
00302       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < gpu_matrix.size1(); ++i)
00303       {
00304         s << "(";
00305         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < gpu_matrix.size2(); ++j)
00306         {
00307           s << tmp[ i * gpu_matrix.internal_size2() + j ];
00308           if (j < gpu_matrix.size2() - 1)
00309             s << ",";
00310         }
00311         s << ")";
00312         if (i < gpu_matrix.size1() - 1)
00313           s << ",";
00314       }
00315       s << ")";
00316       return s;
00317     }

00327     //transfer operations:
00328     //gpu to cpu:
00334     template <typename CPU_MATRIX, typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00335     void copy(const CPU_MATRIX & cpu_matrix,
00336               matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix )
00337     {
00338       gpu_matrix.resize(static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size1()), static_cast<unsigned int>(cpu_matrix.size2()), false);
00339 
00340       std::vector<SCALARTYPE> data(gpu_matrix.internal_size());
00341       typename std::vector<SCALARTYPE>::iterator dst = data.begin();
00342       for (unsigned int i = 0; i < gpu_matrix.size1(); ++i)
00343       {
00344         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < gpu_matrix.size2(); ++j) 
00345           (*dst++) = cpu_matrix(i,j);
00346         for (unsigned int j = gpu_matrix.size2(); j < gpu_matrix.internal_size2(); ++j) 
00347           (*dst++) = static_cast<SCALARTYPE>(0);
00348       }
00349       
00350       //in case that rows and columns are padded:
00351       for (unsigned int i = gpu_matrix.size1(); i < gpu_matrix.internal_size1(); ++i)
00352         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < gpu_matrix.internal_size2(); ++j)
00353           (*dst++) = static_cast<SCALARTYPE>(0);
00354       
00355       gpu_matrix._elements = viennacl::ocl::device().createMemory(CL_MEM_READ_WRITE, data);
00356     }

00358     //gpu to cpu:
00364     template <typename CPU_MATRIX, typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int ALIGNMENT>
00365     void copy(const matrix<SCALARTYPE, F, ALIGNMENT> & gpu_matrix,
00366                      CPU_MATRIX & cpu_matrix )
00367     {
00368       if ( (gpu_matrix.size1() > 0) && (gpu_matrix.size2() > 0) )
00369       {
00370         std::vector<SCALARTYPE> temp_buffer(gpu_matrix.internal_size());
00371         cl_int err = clEnqueueReadBuffer(viennacl::ocl::device().queue(), gpu_matrix.handle(), CL_TRUE, 0, sizeof(SCALARTYPE)*gpu_matrix.internal_size(), &(temp_buffer[0]), 0, NULL, NULL);
00372         CL_ERR_CHECK(err);
00373         viennacl::ocl::finish();
00374         
00375         //now copy entries to cpu_matrix:
00376         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < gpu_matrix.size1(); ++i)
00377           for (unsigned int j = 0; j < gpu_matrix.size2(); ++j) 
00378             cpu_matrix(i,j) = temp_buffer[i * gpu_matrix.internal_size2() + j];
00379       }
00380     }
